Plot: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.
Title: Easy A
Actors: Emma Stone, Penn Badgley, Amanda Bynes, Dan Byrd
tomatoConsensus: It owes a huge debt to older (and better) teen comedies, but Easy A proves a smart, witty showcase for its irresistibly charming star, Emma Stone.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 9 wins & 19 nominations.
